message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1400000. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't accept your offer of $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1800000. This is a fair price considering the product's unique value and features. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $1600000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the product's value, and I'm willing to make a decision at this price.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a decision at $1600000. However, I'm still not willing to accept that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1700000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a great value considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I've made a serious offer of $1600000, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm starting to think that this product may not be worth the investment at this price point. I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement.
